sub_fields.label: Image CTA Styles
sub_fields.name: image_cta_styles
sub_fields.instructions: Select if the CTA will have a transparent content, solid white, or have hover overlay styles.

sub_fields.label: Icon CTA Styles

sub_fields.instructions: Select between a solid icon container or bordered.

sub_fields.label: Icon CTA Layout
sub_fields.name: icon_cta_layout
sub_fields.instructions: Select if the icon will be stacked on left of the content.

sub_fields.label: CTA Center Item
sub_fields.name: cta_text_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: If 'Yes' all items will be centered within the content area.

sub_fields.label: CTA Content

sub_fields.instructions: Full WYSIWYG Controls. Note: For buttons, do not add a link.
